techmeme.title: Telegram rolls out a new account verification method powered by third-parties, new message search filters, and the ability to turn gifts into NFTs (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Asus, Samsung, and MSI separately unveil the world's first 27-inch QD-OLED gaming monitors, offering 4K OLED at 240Hz, without giving release dates or pricing (Tom Warren/The Verge)
While the crypto industry anticipates lighter regulation and wider adoption under Trump, some critics worry about systemic risks, particularly from stablecoins (Financial Times)
Rembrand, which offers AI tools to add product placements in social media videos, raised a $23M Series A and plans to expand to CTV content and add a free tier (Kerry Flynn/Axios)
In 2024, warning calls about catastrophic AI risks were drowned out by the tech industry's promotion of a practical and prosperous vision of generative AI (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
